titleStmt.title: The wels of salvation opened or, a treatise discovering the nature, preciousnesse, usefulness of Gospel-promises, and rules for the right application of them. By William Spurstowe, D.D. pastor of Hackney near London. Imprimatur, Edm. Calamy.
titleStmt.author: Spurstowe, William, 1605?-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. & E.M. for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Features initial errata leaf, table of contents, and final advertisement leaf.
